TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit DashStyles extends System.Object
public ref class DashStyles abstract sealed

summary.span: 實作一組預先定義的 物件。

span.span: Implements a set of predefined objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下圖顯示不同的虛線樣式套用至底線的範例。The following illustration shows examples of different dash styles applied to an underline. ![顯示數種不同的虛線樣式。](~/add/media/graphicsdashstyles.gif "顯示數種不同的虛線樣式。")![Shows several different dash styles.](~/add/media/graphicsdashstyles.gif "Shows several different dash styles.") ## XAML 文字用法XAML Text Usage 您無法宣告這個 managed 的類別[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，但是您可以使用靜態屬性指派值在[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。You cannot declare this managed class in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], but you can use its static properties to assign values in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)].

MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Windows.Media.DashStyle Dash { get; }
.property class System.Windows.Media.DashStyle Dash
Public Shared ReadOnly Property Dash As DashStyle
public: static property System::Windows::Media::DashStyle ^ Dash { System::Windows::Media::DashStyle ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得 屬性等於 2, 2 的 。

span.span: Gets a with a property equal to 2, 2.

value.span: 2,2 的虛線序列 (Sequence)，表示序列中的虛線長度是畫筆 的兩倍，而且虛線後面的空格也是 的兩倍。

span.span: A dash sequence of 2,2, which describes a sequence composed of a dash that is twice as long as the pen followed by a space that is twice as long as the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下圖顯示不同的虛線樣式套用至底線的範例。The following illustration shows examples of different dash styles applied to an underline. ![顯示數種不同的虛線樣式。](~/add/media/graphicsdashstyles.gif "顯示數種不同的虛線樣式。")![Shows several different dash styles.](~/add/media/graphicsdashstyles.gif "Shows several different dash styles.") ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage <*object* *property* ="{ `DashStyles.Dash`}"/><*object* *property* ="{ `DashStyles.Dash`}"/>

summary.span: 取得具有空白 屬性的 。

span.span: Gets a with an empty property.
A dash sequence with no dashes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性會產生實線，相當於未定義的虛線序列。This property produces a solid line and is equivalent to not defining a dash sequence. 下圖顯示不同的虛線樣式套用至底線的範例。The following illustration shows examples of different dash styles applied to an underline. ![顯示數種不同的虛線樣式。](~/add/media/graphicsdashstyles.gif "顯示數種不同的虛線樣式。")![Shows several different dash styles.](~/add/media/graphicsdashstyles.gif "Shows several different dash styles.") ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage <*object* *property* ="{ `DashStyles.Solid`}"/><*object* *property* ="{ `DashStyles.Solid`}"/>
